MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL22 postcode area of Abergele, affecting properties in Dundonald Avenue, Pentre Avenue, Pentre Mawr and the surrounding area. It will necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:00AM due to an underground cable fault. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 2:00PM. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:15AM on 14th October 2020
